tool_description: Generates semantic keyword clusters and provides search metrics for content optimization and topic expansion.

seed_keywords.description: Initial keywords to expand into clusters

cluster_size.description: Desired cluster size: small, medium, large

error_messages: Invalid cluster size: Use one of [small, medium, large]
Empty seed keywords: Provide at least one seed keyword
Keyword limit exceeded: Maximum 50 seed keywords allowed
Invalid keyword format: Ensure keywords are non-empty strings
usage: Provide seed_keywords array and optionally configure cluster_size, include_questions, and include_long_tail. Returns organized keyword clusters with metrics.

search_volumes.description: Total monthly search volume for each cluster

difficulty_scores.description: SEO difficulty scores (0-100) for each cluster

content_opportunities.description: Content opportunity scores (0-100) for each cluster
